page.title: 19Bondleigh Attitudes
page.content: Bondleigh attributes its peaceful, relaxing environment to the pace of its farming community, wildlife and natural surroundings. Whilst there has been a change in the occupancy of many of the older premises which have been bought by people from outside the area most of the inhabitants are involved in some form of farming activity, an occupation demanding long hours, hard work and dedication. New faces bring new ideas, not always acceptable to former residents; whilst others feel that it is benificial for the local economy, and gives a greater understanding of the fulfilments and disappointments experienced by people from varying walks of life. Tolerance of free speech from both sides is to be encouraged, and when this happens, it enriches the culture of the community.
